title: Combine multiple targets
description: Target options for combining multiple targets into one

exclude.description: Projects to exclude, note that the project running the glob builder is excluded by default if the target is the target this builder is registered for

target.description: The target to run in the configured projects, defaults to the target this builder is configured for if neither target nor builder are set

builder.description: The builder to run in the configured projects

configuration.description: The configuration to run the target with

options.description: Options to pass into the configured target or builder

unknownTarget.description: What to do if the glob encounters a project that doesn't include the requested target: fail or skip the project

unknownConfiguration.description: What to do if the glob encounters a target that is missing a requested configuration: fail, skip the project or run without the unknown configuration

maxParallel.description: The maximum number of jobs to have running at a time

scheduler.description: Define the scheduler to run jobs with
